mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (menu_name, price, image_name, category, description, is_available) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{price}, #{imageName}, #{category}, #{description}, #{isAvailable})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, price = #{price}, image_name = #{imageName}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, is_available = #{isAvailable}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, menu_name, price, image_name, category, description, is_available, created_at, updated_at FROM menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, price, image_name, category, description, is_available, created_at, updated_at FROM menu ORDER BY menu_id
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, price, image_name, category, description, is_available, created_at, updated_at FROM menu WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY menu_id
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, price, image_name, category, description, is_available, created_at, updated_at FROM menu WHERE is_available = true ORDER BY menu_id
